definition: tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated

sentences.english: A chronic fungous infection which involves the sebaceous glands and hair follicles may result in alopecia.
sentences.chinese: 累及皮脂腺和毛囊的慢性真菌性感染都會引起脫髮。

sentences.english: The lumbosacral subdural space is most commonly affected.
sentences.chinese: 腰骶部的硬膜下腔是最常見的累及部位。

sentences.english: The infarction is "transmural" in that it extends through the full thickness of the wall.
sentences.chinese: 梗死是透壁性的即累及心肌的全層。

sentences.english: Mestatatic osteosarcomas usually involve the right side of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 轉移性骨肉瘤通常累及右心。

sentences.english: It furthers these women’s isolation and social exclusion, and compromises their dignity.
sentences.chinese: 進而讓這些女性被社會孤立和排斥，累及她們的尊嚴。

sentences.english: When the right heart was involved, it looked like "walking stick head" or "snakeheads".
sentences.chinese: 累及右心腔時可見似“柺杖頭”或“蛇頭”狀改變。

sentences.english: It often grows through the nasal choana into the nasopharynx.
sentences.chinese: 常常可以通過後鼻孔累及鼻咽部。

sentences.english: Symptomatology depends on whether the disease involves the anterior or retrobulbar portion of the orbit.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀症狀依靠於病變是否累及眼眶的前方或球后。

sentences.english: To observe the clinical effect of operative treatment of calcaneus fracture involved posterior articular surface.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察手術治療累及後關節面的跟骨骨折效果。

sentences.english: During 2 year follow-up, the skin lesion progressed slowly with no other systemic involvement.
sentences.chinese: 隨訪2年，患者皮損進展緩慢，其他系統未累及。

sentences.english: When disease involves the sphenoid, the sinus can be penetrated either intranasally or through the posterior ethmoid.
sentences.chinese: 當病變累及蝶竇，可以經鼻內和後組篩竇進入蝶竇。

sentences.english: Approximately 7% of all tibia plateau fractures affect the posterolateral corner.
sentences.chinese: 大約7%的脛骨平臺骨折累及後外側角。

sentences.english: Constant irritability can cause your relationships to suffer and eventually even begin to wither.
sentences.chinese: 持續的易怒煩躁會累及你的人際關係並最終使之枯萎。

sentences.english: Most of enlarged nodes was in the right peritracheal and tracheobronchial region, and showed homegeneous density on plain scans.
sentences.chinese: 病變多累及右側氣管旁和氣管支氣管區淋巴結。

sentences.english: A coronal section through the frontal lobes reveals extensive contusions involving the inferior gyri.
sentences.chinese: 額葉冠狀面顯示累及下方腦回的廣泛挫傷。

sentences.english: The electrophysiologic and pathologic findings indicate a pattern of axonal loss that predominantly affects large-caliber myelinated fibers.
sentences.chinese: 電生理和病理結果顯示軸突丟失主要累及粗有髓纖維。

definition: to be put to a lot of trouble
to get dragged into/to get involved (on sb else's account)
mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)
